overview: Businessman Alan Fenlon ( 47 ) is on the run from authorities. Exhausted , frightened and hunted by his own anxiety, he decides to take in at a hotel to rest and gather your thoughts . Well ensconced inside the hotel , he meets himself in the door ? literally! This is the beginning of a battle with inner demons where the distinction between right and wrong, moral and immoral has been incised out .
title: For Fenlon
